citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30p on
13-Jul-17.
ACI Bartels arrived at the facility, knocked on the front door, rang the doorbell, honked the government vehicle horn,
and then spoke with a licensee that stated that she was at work and was unavailable for an inspection.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30p on
13-Jul-17.
ACI Bartels arrived at the facility, knocked on the front door, rang the doorbell, honked the government vehicle horn,
and then spoke with a licensee that stated that she was at work and was unavailable for an inspection.
